title: Apply a Renewal Credit
description: A long-time customer with no claims is eligible for a loyalty credit on their policy renewal.

tasks.description: As part of the renewal process, identify that the customer is eligible for a loyalty discount.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags the policy as eligible for the credit.

tasks.description: Apply the loyalty credit to the renewal premium.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically reduces the renewal premium by the discount amount.

tasks.description: Ensure the renewal documents clearly show the credit that was applied.
tasks.expected_outcome: The generated renewal offer clearly itemizes the loyalty credit.
